generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, including a large arrow pointing straight ahead in the foreground.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the image, bordered by curbs and poles, and adjacent to buildings.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the image, including a large brick building on the left and a white building on the right.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Two people are visible on bicycles, each wearing a helmet and riding in the same direction.
- rider: The two people on bicycles are classified as riders since they are operating vehicles (bicycles).
- bicycle: Two bicycles are visible, each being ridden by a person.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at the intersection, indicating that vehicles should stop.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating "alle Richtungen" (all directions) is visible above the traffic light.
- terrain: Some grass and soil are visible along the sidewalk and in small patches near the curb.
